title: Soooo when is the client shutting down?
body: I'm not sure if it was shutting down at 3:00am pacific time or 3:00pm

replies.body:
Everything looks to be running just fine now.  Per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na), the downtime is slated for 3am pacific...tonight.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-W6as8oVcuM

RED POST PLEASE 11:00 UTC IS 3:00 AM PST. 
RED POST PLEASE.
